name: The Dragon Alchemist
description:
This is an early project I'm working on. I'm uploading it hear so my friend can try it out during development.

Controls

wasd-movement /L: shoot/K and J:specials

Space bar: Focus

Alchemy

Fire: 2 Water: 2 Air: 0 Earth: 0

Fire: 0 Water: 0 Air: 3 Earth: 2

Fire: 14 Water: 14 Air: 0 Earth: 2

Fire: 14 Water: 14 Air: 3 Earth: 2
